Hi -

Is there any plan in the near future to support some TestNG features =
like:

1) Ability to re-run only the failed tests by storing the list of
fa=
iled tests persistently in an XML file etc. I have thought through a
patch =
to Junit to address this. Would there be any interest in using
this patch?
=

2) Allow non-static Before|After Class methods?

3) Support dependsOnMetho=
ds annotation like TestNG ?
